Detailed Description

This class represents the widget used to list shared files.

void CSharedFilesCtrl::DoShowFile ( CKnownFile *  file,
bool  batch 
) [private]

Adds the specified file to the list.

If 'batch' is true, the item will be inserted last, and the files-count will not be updated, nor is the list checked for dupes.

References CMuleListCtrl::GetInsertPos(), and ShowFilesCount().

Referenced by ShowFile(), and ShowFileList().

void CSharedFilesCtrl::DrawAvailabilityBar ( CKnownFile *  file,
wxDC *  dc,
const wxRect &  rect 
) const [private]

Draws the graph of file-part availability.

Parameters:
file The file to make a graph over.
dc The wcDC to draw on.
rect The drawing area.

This function draws a barspan showing the availability of the parts of a file, for both Part-files and Known-files. Availability for Part-files is determined using the currently known sources, while availability for Known-files is determined using the sources requesting that file.

References CBarShader::Draw(), CBarShader::FillRange(), CBarShader::Set3dDepth(), CBarShader::SetFileSize(), CBarShader::SetHeight(), and CBarShader::SetWidth().

Referenced by OnDrawItem().

void CSharedFilesCtrl::ShowFile ( CKnownFile *  file  ) 

Adds the specified file to the list, updating filecount and more.
